entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening and ending before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
